mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QUESTION_BOARD (NO, CATE_NO,WRITER,TITLE,CONTENT,ENROLL_DATE, DELETE_YN,MODIFY_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_QUESTION_BOARD_NO,#{cateNo},#{writer},#{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE,'N',SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT C.NAME, Q.TITLE, Q.ENROLL_DATE FROM QUESTION_BOARD Q JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY C ON Q.CATE_NO= C.NO
SELECT C.NAME,Q.TITLE, M.NICK, Q.ENROLL_DATE FROM QUESTION_BOARD Q JOIN COMMON_CATEGORY ON Q.CATE_NO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = Q.WRITER
